faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our Next.js starter template. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to contact our support team.

faq-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
faq-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial. You can cancel at any time during the trial period and you won't be charged.

faq-2.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faq-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. You can do this from your account settings.

faq-3.question: Where can I find my invoices?
faq-3.answer: You can find your invoices in your account settings.

faq-4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq-4.answer: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.

faq-5.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq-5.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. You can do this from your account settings.

faq-6.question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
faq-6.answer: Yes, we offer a 50% discount for non-profits. Please contact us to learn more.

faq.supportDescription: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help with any technical questions or concerns.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the best plan for your needs

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Get the latest updates and improvements to our platform.
changelog.keywords: changelog, updates, improvements, releases, features, bug fixes, version history

v1_3_0.title: Enhanced Documentation and Changelog
v1_3_0.description: We've support for Chinese documentation and changelog. You can now read the documentation in Chinese and add the changelog page.

v1_2_0.title: Enhanced Payments and Affiliate System
v1_2_0.description: We've added a new payments(creem.io) and affiliate(Affonso) to our template. You can now easily manage your payments and affiliates.

v1_0_0.title: First version of our saas template
v1_0_0.description: Introducing a new saas template to help you ship your saas product faster. We are excited to launch our template and help you get started. We are always working to improve our template and your experience.

hero.heading: The Ultimate Next.js Starter Kit for Your Next Project
hero.subHeading: Build and Ship faster with the Next.js Starter Kit. Ship in days, not months.

testimonials.title: Trusted by developers worldwide
testimonials.description: Join thousands of developers who are already building the future with our AI platform

testimonial-1.text: Using this AI platform has transformed how we handle data analysis. The speed and accuracy are unprecedented.

testimonial-2.text: The API integration is flawless. We've reduced our development time by 60% since implementing this solution.

testimonial-3.text: Finally, an AI tool that actually understands context! The accuracy in natural language processing is impressive.

step-1.title: Clone the Template
step-1.content: Clone or download the Next.js starter template from GitHub

step-2.title: Configure Your Project
step-2.content: Set up your environment variables, and customize the template to match your project needs.

step-3.title: Deploy and Launch
step-3.content: Deploy your application to your preferred hosting platform like Vercel, Cloudflare, or AWS

tabs.heading: A Collection of Components Built With Shadcn & Tailwind
tabs.description: Join us to build flawless web solutions.

content.title: Customize themes with minimal code changes.
content.description: Beautiful and modern styling that can be easily customized to match your brand. Change colors, fonts, and layouts with just a few lines of code.

content.title: Deploy to any platform natively.
content.description: Native support for deployment to Cloudflare, AWS, Vercel, and other major platforms. Deploy everywhere with optimized configurations.

content.title: Built with modern Next.js stack.
content.description: Powered by the latest Next.js, Shadcn UI, Better Auth, Drizzle ORM, and other cutting-edge technologies for the best developer experience.

common.openLinkInBrowser: If you're having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser:
common.useLink: You can also use the following link:

emailVerification.subject: Verify your email address
emailVerification.body:
Hi {name},

Welcome! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below to complete your account setup.

This helps us keep your account secure and ensures you receive important updates.

magicLink.subject: Sign in to your account
magicLink.body:
Hey,

Click the button below to securely sign in to your account.

This link will expire in 15 minutes for your security.

forgotPassword.subject: Reset your password
forgotPassword.body:
Hi {name},

We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.

If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.

newsletterSignup.subject: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
newsletterSignup.body:
Hey,

Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! ðŸŽ‰

You'll receive the latest updates, exclusive content, and special offers directly in your inbox.

We're excited to have you on board!

general.title: General
general.name: Name
general.emailNote: To change your email, enter the new email and hit save. You will have to confirm the new email before it will become active.
general.emailCanNotBeUpdated: Please contact us to change your email.
general.emailUpdateSuccess: Email change request sent! Please follow these steps: 1) First, click the verify link in your OLD email address, 2) Then, click the verify link in your NEW email address. The new email will become active only after completing both verification steps.

languageSettings.title: Language Settings
languageSettings.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: We'd hate to see you go, but you're welcome to delete your account anytime. Just remember, once you delete it, it's gone forever.
deleteAccount.confirmation: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all your data, settings, and content.

notifications.success: Your account has been successfully deleted. You will be redirected to the sign-in page.
notifications.error: Failed to delete account. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?

forgotPassword.successMessage: We have sent you a link to reset your password. Please check your email.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Please enter a new password for your account.
resetPassword.invalidLinkSubtitle: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.invalidLinkError: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new password reset.
resetPassword.invalidTokenError: Invalid or missing reset token. Please request a new password reset link.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
